name: Happy Birthday [Complete]
description:
A birthday game I made for my friends, (As obviously listed on cover image).

Similar to another game I posted, Camp Defenders (which was a revamped version of this game), this one has a story and is completed with several more characters.

[Controls]

WASD - Move

1 for first ability (usually damage attack)

2 for second ability (usually utility attack [slowing, stunning])

3 for ultimate ability (Vocals used from game "Persona 4 - Chie" [disclaimer: not mine] which was a joke for my friends)

Spacebar to continue the story.

[Character's Abilities]

K= Yuuki: (No reason) - Yuuki's Element is Fire. - Passive: Basic attacks deal 10 damage over 1 second. - Offence: Leaving small trails for 2 seconds over 3 seconds damaging enemies. Cooldown: 10 sec. - Defence: Global slow for 4 seconds. Cooldown: 10 sec. - Ult: Fire ball shower. Cooldown: 15 sec. S= Haru: (No reason) - Haru's Element is Earth. - Passive: Every basic attack that hits recover 0.25 hp. - Offence: Shoots bolder across screen damage as it passes through. Cooldown: 2 sec. - Defence: Summon wall for 4 second. Cooldown: 5 sec. - Ult: Screen damage dealing. Cooldown: 15 sec. P= Shouji: (Soar) - Shouji's Element is Wind. - Passive: Increased attack speed. - Offence: Shoots an air cutter. Cooldown: 1 sec. - Defence: Minions are slowly being slide back for 3 seconds when touching wind. Cooldown: 7 sec. - Ult: Tornado damages and slows when slime passes through for 6 seconds. Cooldown: 15 sec. C= Akira: (Bright) - Akira's Element is lightning. - Passive: 25% critical chance. (2x damage) - Offence: Line of lightning. Cooldown: 3 sec. - Defence: AOE snare no damage for 2 seconds. Cooldown: 4 sec. - Ult: Shockwave stunning and dealing tons of damage. Cooldown: 15 sec. Y= Izumi: (Fountain Spring) - Izumi's Element is Water. - Passive: Increased mana regen. - Offence: 8 Bubbles damaging enemies on collision, stays for 6 seconds. Cooldown: 10 sec. - Defence: Places a water slide that slow enemies and speeds up Yao. Cooldown: 6 sec. - Ult: Sucking into center of DEATH dealing damage. 4 seconds. Cooldown: 15 sec. B= Kira: (Dark) - Kira's Element is Dark. - Passive: Increased effect if no skills were used in the last 10 seconds. Also slows with Basic Attack. - Offence: 8 Dark orbs deals out and in damage. Bonus: 16 orbs and empowering the 8 original. Cooldown: 6 sec. - Defence: Drags enemies towards Karla. Bonus: larger radius and longer duration. Cooldown: 10 sec. - Ult: Death ball follows cursor erasing everything for 4 seconds. Bonus: Faster and longer duration. Cooldown: 15 sec. L= Mitsuko: (Child of the Light) - Mitsuko's Element is Light. - Passive: After using 10 skills, Laura gains bonus attack speed and movement speed for 5 seconds. - Passive: When lost all health, recovers 20 health and is invulnerable for 2 seconds. - Offence: Places a circle dealing a lot of damage after 2 seconds. Stacks up to 3 times. Cooldown: 6 per stack. (1 sec between) - Defence: Flashes stunning all on screen. Cooldown: 10 sec. - Ult: OP BEAM FROM SKY. Lasts 5 seconds. Cooldown: 15 sec.
